name: Brian Taylor
description: Welcome! I'm Brian Taylor, a dedicated Full Stack Developer with a knack for building scalable web applications and working across the full stack of technology. With a love for coding and design, I craft software and digital solutions that are not only functional but also aesthetically pleasing.
fullstack: I have experience in developing web applications using modern technologies and a strong understanding of key frameworks. My curiosity and commitment to lifelong learning keep me updated with technological advancements.
experience: I have experience with web applications, mobile apps, and APIs. I excel in both team settings and solo projects, adapting quickly in fast-paced environments to meet deadlines.
backend: As a Back-End Developer, I focus on building APIs and web services with cutting-edge technologies. I have experience in databases and data modeling, proficient in both SQL and NoSQL.
education: I have a certification in Full Stack Development from a 500+ hour program focused on product development, object-oriented programming, MVC frameworks, data modeling, and teamwork.
interests: I'm passionate about technology and software development and continuously learning new technologies. I enjoy working on diverse projects and seek opportunities to grow.
softSkills: I have strong communication skills and work well with both technical and non-technical teams. Iâ€™m a quick learner, eager to grow, and enjoy collaborating to achieve common goals.
